name: GreenMem® GM300X-0510
description: GreenMem® GM300X-0510 offers a versatile solution for multiple industrial processes, including wax removal, solvent recovery, API concentration and purification, free fatty acid removal, homogeneous catalyst recovery, hydrocarbon separation, lipid removal, monomer removal, and solvent exchange. It is characterized by its cost-effectiveness, high surface area, lower energy consumption, high separation speed, and low CO2 emissions. As an efficient filter aid, it enhances various chemical and industrial manufacturing applications.
